verses.roman:
ihāṅ yadi mahāprabhu eteka kahilā
haricandana-pātra yāi' rājāre kahilā

synonyms: ihāṅ—here; yadi—when; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; eteka kahilā—spoke like this; haricandana-pātra—the officer named Haricandana Pātra; yāi'-going; rājāre kahilā—informed the King.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu replied in this way, an officer named Haricandana Pātra went to the King and spoke with him.
